lines.i: Information on whether the infant was being breastfed during the period between birth and discharge from the hospital.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.27"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:390)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:392)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:391)/@code="73756-9" Infant is being breastfed at discharge (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - that it indicates whether the infant is being breastfed.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:393)
Information to identify whether the infant was being breastfed at discharge.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:390)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:392)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:391)/@code="73756-9" Infant is being breastfed at discharge (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - that it indicates whether the infant is being breastfed.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:393)
Information to identify whether the infant was being breastfed at discharge.

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <id root="MDHT" extension="507651358"/> <code code="57583024"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="BL"/> </observation>
